babel-desc: Paahi a #babel Pɛɛsa toma ka lɛ vɛŋ ka fo nyɛ babel tontona daga kɔlɔm ne kpeɛŋo a toɔŋ paahi a tampiletiri
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Tontoneba naŋ a gbulo ŋa wulo ka ba taa la bambo te kyaare neŋ $1 ko kɔkɔre $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Tontoneba naŋ a gbulo ŋa wulo ka ba bambo ne a kɔkɔre $1.
babel-0: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|zikpale ane]] bambo ne [[$2|$3]] (bee a taa muni wombo, anaa zaa ka kpeɛŋaa be be).
babel-1: A tontona taa la [[$1|fẽẽ]] ane bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-2: A tontona ŋa taala [[$1|pare fẽẽ ne]] bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-3: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|kpoŋ ane]] bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-4: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1| peɛle la aŋa a kɔkɔre deme]] ane bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-5: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|gaŋdaaloŋ ane]] bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-N: A tontona ŋa taa la a [[$1|kɔkɔre deme arezie]] ane a muni wombo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-0-n: A tontona ŋa ba taa la [[$1|zikpale ane]] bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrfo]] (bee a taa muni wombo, anaa zaa ka kpeɛŋaa be be).
babel-1-n: A tontona taa la [[$1|fẽẽ]] ane bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrfo]].
babel-2-n: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|gaŋ fẽẽ lɛ ne]] bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrfo]].
babel-3-n: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|kpoŋ ane]] bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrfo]].
babel-4-n: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1| peɛle la aŋa a kɔkɔre deme]] ane bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrfo]].
babel-5-n: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|gaŋdaaloŋ ane]] bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrfo]].
babel-N-n: A tontona ŋa taa la a [[$1|kɔkɔre deme arezie]] ane a muni wombo ne [[$2|Bɔrfo]].
